name: swaad-sutra
description: Society Home Food Ordering - Swaad Sutra

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && cd ../frontend && npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.dev: echo 'Run backend and frontend separately - see README'
scripts.build: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:copy && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm run build
